name: The Froggy Rage game; speedrun
description:
After being  banned from his home town of (redacted) for single handedly taking hostage and killing the clan of lizards he has decided to spend his next few years training to become even stronger to take out the corrupt government and stop the illegal hippo cocaine drug trade.

I know it says the game is unsafe i have no fucking clue how to fix it i promise im not gonna scam you lol.

The goal is to get to the hole in the top right corner of the map and get your trophy and you win! Best time wins lol

This is my first game i started coding 4 days ago so don't get your hopes up lmao.
